Achille Brice (onye a mụrụ Assoua Achille Brices Eteki n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Cameroon, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri. A matara ọrụ ya na Life Point n'etiti ihe nkiri 20 n'ime 1,000 e nyere maka asọmpi na l'Étalon d'or de Yennenga na Pan African Film Festival na Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso. N'afọ 2011, ọ natara nhọpụta atọ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Cameroon na Zulu African Film Academy Awards for Obsession, ihe nkiri asụsụ Bekee mbụ nke Cameroon a ga-ahọpụta na Ecrans Noirs Film Festival maka Ecrans D'Afrique Central, Prix Charles Mensa na CRANS Noir Film Festival. Ọ bụ onye guzobere BinAm Studios, nzukọ na-emeghe maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri iji kesaa ma kpọsaa ngwaahịa ha.
A mụrụ Achille dịka Assoua Achille Brice Eteki na Eprel 9, 1984, na Buea
Dịka mbipụta dị na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Music in Africa si kwuo, ọ gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Buea na agụmakwụkwọ tertiary na University College of Technology Southwest Region (Cameroon)
Tupu ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri, o mere egwu ruo afọ ise dịka onye na-edekọ egwu na onye na-ese egwu
Abọm izizi ya akpọrọ Hood Classics
A hụrụ ya dịka onye nchịkọta ihe nkiri n'afọ 2003 na ihe nkiri Luxury N'afọ 2007, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UCT, a nabatara ya na nhazi na iduzi ihe ọmụmụ na Genesis Pictures na Buea.
Ọrụ ọkachamara ya malitere n'afọ 2006 na ihe nkiri abụọ a họpụtara na Verdant Hills Minifilms Festival
A họọrọ ọnụahịa nna nna na fim dị mkpirikpi (2007/2008), A Woman's World (2008/2009) na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2008, ọ nọchitere anya Cameroon na Durban International Film Festival na South Africa
O sonyere na Berlinale talent campus nakwa na Durban Talent Campus na 2009
Ọ bụ onye nwe BinAm Studios.
